The video was published on Facebook on A: 2019, and has been viewed more than 980,000 times.
The Urdu: language caption in the misleading Facebook post translates to English as a plea for sharing the video to expose the alleged atrocities committed by Indian forces in Kashmir.
The same video has been shared on multip: 4. A reverse image search on Google found a YouTube video published on August 29, 2017, showing a similar incident of police lathi charge in the Indian city of Panchkula, unrelated to the claim about Indian police attacking Muslims from Kashmir.
